member.name: TransportInformation
member.summary: Contains the current values of media playback transport-related information obtained from the DMR.

member.name: TransportInformation.CurrentSpeed
member.summary: A PlaySpeed structure, indicating the current speed at which the DMR is playing the content, or was last playing the content.

member.name: TransportInformation.CurrentTransportState
member.summary: A value from the TransportState enumeration, indicating the current transport state of the DMR.

member.name: TransportInformation.CurrentTransportStatus
member.summary: A value from the TransportStatus enumeration, indicating the current transport status reported by the DMR.
